title: Hack The Box debuts HTB AI Range to test AI and human cyber defense side by side
description: Cybersecurity training company Hack The Box Ltd. today unveiled HTB AI Range, a controlled artificial intelligence cyber range built to test and benchmark the safety, limits and capabilities of autonomous AI security agents. Claimed to be a world’s first, HTB…
